<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sort the function infos by address range first, preserving input order</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add the first function info to the top level functions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TopLevelFuncs.emplace&#95;back(std::move(Funcs.front()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now if the next function info has the same address range as the top level,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then merge it into the top level function, otherwise add it to the top</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// level.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx = 1; Idx &lt; Funcs.size(); ++Idx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo">FunctionInfo</a> &amp;TopFunc = TopLevelFuncs.back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo">FunctionInfo</a> &amp;MatchFunc = Funcs&#91;Idx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TopFunc.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo/#a102aa70a223f40f43c99d916bc69a603">Range</a> == MatchFunc.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo/#a102aa70a223f40f43c99d916bc69a603">Range</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Both have the same range - add the 2nd func as a child of the 1st func</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!TopFunc.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo/#a03611a5afc9cc137c5d0550d9e0a06f1">MergedFunctions</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">        TopFunc.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo/#a03611a5afc9cc137c5d0550d9e0a06f1">MergedFunctions</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/gsym/functioninfo-cpp/#a3e1eb307ada3e1ef3a115f4c734aa5eea13e6f453fc178a85f4f96cef6fbfe02c">MergedFunctionsInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Avoid adding duplicate functions to MergedFunctions. Since functions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are already ordered within the Funcs array, we can just check equality</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// against the last function in the merged array.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TopFunc.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo/#a03611a5afc9cc137c5d0550d9e0a06f1">MergedFunctions</a>-&gt;MergedFunctions.back() == MatchFunc)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TopFunc.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo/#a03611a5afc9cc137c5d0550d9e0a06f1">MergedFunctions</a>-&gt;MergedFunctions.emplace&#95;back(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">          std::move(MatchFunc));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No match, add the function as a top-level function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TopLevelFuncs.emplace&#95;back(std::move(MatchFunc));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t mergedCount = Funcs.size() - TopLevelFuncs.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If any functions were merged, print a message about it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (mergedCount != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Out &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Have &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; mergedCount</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; merged functions as children of other functions\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(Funcs, TopLevelFuncs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/gsymcreator/#abdaa5c17b22848e0de64e78984c8d07c"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">llvm::Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/gsymcreator/#abdaa5c17b22848e0de64e78984c8d07c">GsymCreator::finalize</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/outputaggregator">OutputAggregator</a> &amp;Out) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::lock&#95;guard&lt;std::mutex&gt; Guard(Mutex);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Finalized)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4d2fd926089a58d482fb67a362e11bad">createStringError</a>(std::errc::invalid&#95;argument, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;already finalized&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Finalized = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t let the string table indexes change by finalizing in order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  StrTab.finalizeInOrder();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove duplicates function infos that have both entries from debug info</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (DWARF or Breakpad) and entries from the SymbolTable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also handle overlapping function. Usually there shouldn&#39;t be any, but they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can and do happen in some rare cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (a)          (b)         (c)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ^  ^       ^            ^</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     |X |Y      |X ^         |X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     |  |       |  |Y        |  ^</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     |  |       |  v         v  |Y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     v  v       v               v</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In (a) and (b), Y is ignored and X will be reported for the full range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In (c), both functions will be included in the result and lookups for an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// address in the intersection will return Y because of binary search.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that in case of (b), we cannot include Y in the result because then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we wouldn&#39;t find any function for range (end of Y, end of X)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with binary search</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumBefore = Funcs.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only sort and unique if this isn&#39;t a segment. If this is a segment we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// already finalized the main GsymCreator with all of the function infos</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and then the already sorted and uniqued function infos were added to this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// object.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!IsSegment) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumBefore &gt; 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sort function infos so we can emit sorted functions. Use stable sort to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ensure determinism.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a076f93c387f454f0db13d4bc7d4e7f9c">llvm::stable&#95;sort</a>(Funcs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::vector&lt;FunctionInfo&gt; FinalizedFuncs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FinalizedFuncs.reserve(Funcs.size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FinalizedFuncs.emplace&#95;back(std::move(Funcs.front()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx=1; Idx &lt; NumBefore; ++Idx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo">FunctionInfo</a> &amp;Prev = FinalizedFuncs.back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo">FunctionInfo</a> &amp;Curr = Funcs&#91;Idx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Empty ranges won&#39;t intersect, but we still need to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// catch the case where we have multiple symbols at the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// same address and coalesce them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ranges&#95;equal = Prev.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo/#a102aa70a223f40f43c99d916bc69a603">Range</a> == Curr.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo/#a102aa70a223f40f43c99d916bc69a603">Range</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ranges&#95;equal || Prev.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo/#a102aa70a223f40f43c99d916bc69a603">Range</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/addressrange/#a978098dc4eb29f90b3e9cbbf09d2c42a">intersects</a>(Curr.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo/#a102aa70a223f40f43c99d916bc69a603">Range</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Overlapping ranges or empty identical ranges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ranges&#95;equal) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Same address range. Check if one is from debug</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// info and the other is from a symbol table. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so, then keep the one with debug info. Our</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sorting guarantees that entries with matching</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// address ranges that have debug info are last in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the sort.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!(Prev == Curr)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Prev.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo/#a4e97135bd7730c4555dea03637855e03">hasRichInfo</a>() &amp;&amp; Curr.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo/#a4e97135bd7730c4555dea03637855e03">hasRichInfo</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">                Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/outputaggregator/#a051eee638f618d1ebe54f433350b7c1d">Report</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Duplicate address ranges with different debug info.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      OS &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;warning: same address range contains &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;different debug &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;info. Removing:\\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         &lt;&lt; Prev &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\nIn favor of this one:\\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         &lt;&lt; Curr &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want to swap the current entry with the previous since</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// later entries with the same range always have more debug info</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or different debug info.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">              <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(Prev, Curr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Out.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/outputaggregator/#a051eee638f618d1ebe54f433350b7c1d">Report</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Overlapping function ranges&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// print warnings about overlaps</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">              OS &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;warning: function ranges overlap:\\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">                &lt;&lt; Prev &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">                &lt;&lt; Curr &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">            FinalizedFuncs.emplace&#95;back(std::move(Curr));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Prev.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo/#a102aa70a223f40f43c99d916bc69a603">Range</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/addressrange/#afe148fdaacb37330c6cfb734abbf610a">size</a>() == 0 &amp;&amp; Curr.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo/#a102aa70a223f40f43c99d916bc69a603">Range</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/addressrange/#accce80061bb85f65b4223c49d91216a0">contains</a>(Prev.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gsym/functioninfo/#a102aa70a223f40f43c99d916bc69a603">Range</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/addressrange/#a37ab39927de3ceda2cd6766243b516b9">start</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Symbols on macOS don&#39;t have address ranges, so if the range</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// doesn&#39;t match and the size is zero, then we replace the empty</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// symbol function info with the current one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(Prev, Curr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">            FinalizedFuncs.emplace&#95;back(std::move(Curr));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If our last function info entry doesn&#39;t have a size and if we have valid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// text ranges, we should set the size of the last entry since any search for</span></CodeLine>
